title: Authme导致BC建筑机采石场等无法破坏方块
author: fengziyue
txt_content:
大概为什么无法破坏我也知道， BC破坏用的是[Buildcraft]这个帐号
除了换掉Authme这个插件还有什么办法

replies.author: 鬼畜畜
replies.txt_content: bc有给虚拟玩家op的指令 /buildcraft help查看

replies.author: 雲都
replies.txt_content:
unrestrictions:
        # Below you can list all account names that AuthMe will ignore
        # for registration or login. Configure it at your own risk!!
        # This option adds compatibility with BuildCraft and some other mods.
        # It is case-insensitive! Example:
        # UnrestrictedName:
        # - 'n**layer'
        # - 'n**layer2'
        UnrestrictedName:
        - '[BuildCraft]'

找到和这段差不多的地方，添加


然后在输入 /buildcraft op


就可以了
